text.section: No person shall approve the construction, installation, or alteration of an on-site sewage disposal system unless it is in conformance with the regulations issued by the cabinet.
Upon appeal of any decision to revoke or suspend a certification, an administrative hearing shall be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 107, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 392, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1982.
